metadata.title: When Does the Current Offset Processing Occurs?

sections.content:
Question:
When the current offset process (initial offset tuning) is executed?
Answer:
Current offset process is executed at MCU reset.
Adjust the offset current according to the current parasitic capacitance value so that the count value becomes the target reference value.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
